stepOne.title: Step One
stepOne.description: Edit Dashboard/index.tsx to change this screen and then come back to see your edits.

navigation.title: Navigation
navigation.description: Navigation makes use of the React Navigation library. This is a library that is used by many React Native applications.

nativeBase.title: Native Base
nativeBase.description: Native Base is a UI library that is used by many React Native applications. It is a great way to get started with React Native.
